document.heading: AN URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, ENACTED PURSUANT TO CALIFORNIA GOVERNMENT CODE SECTION 65858 APPROVING AN EXTENSION OF THE MORATORIUM PROHIBITING OUTDOOR CULTIVATION, PROCESSING, MANUFACTURE, DISTRIBUTION, TESTING AND SALE OF MARIJUANA IN ALL ZONING DISTRICTS IN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON TO NOVEMBER 14, 2018 PENDING REVIEW AND POSSIBLE AMENDMENT OF MUNICIPAL CODE REGULATIONS; AND SETTING FORTH THE FACTS CONSTITUTING SUCH URGENCY
